Plot: After escaping from Citizen Plus, Marty and Citizen Brown return to 1931 to prevent Emmett from making the worst mistake of his life.
Title: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 4, Double Visions
Writer: Robert Zemeckis (characters), Bob Gale (characters), Bob Gale (story), Andy Hartzell
Actors: A.J. LoCascio, Christopher Lloyd, Rebecca Schweitzer, Shannon Nicholson
